name: Ancient Periods
description: Centuries have passed since the last nuclear war. The long-awaited peaceful future has come true. But it's always exciting to discover what the past holds. That's why a group of archeologists were excavating another ancient city that year. And eventually their excavation was a huge success! They found a well-preserved piece of some ancient technology, belonging to the 21st century AD, that has never been seen before. It was immediately taken to a laboratory to inspect its possible capabilities. You, Dr. Akefyvcleiner was entrusted with the important task of running various tests to find out the purpose of the relic.
